txt.en: 'Thank you, traveller. The forest has become dangerous, and hunting is no longer safe. This venison will feed us for several days. I will tell the others how you bravely entered the wilds to hunt on our behalf.'
Goslim can be found in the village of Arhaim in Duskenvale.\n\nYou should bring the collected venison to Goslim.
To gain the favour of the villagers of Arhaim, you have been asked to hunt deer in Duskenvale.\n\nYou should collect venison from the deer in Duskenvale.
The wilds are no longer safe, so the village of Arhaim cannot freely hunt the deer there. Braving the wilds to provide them food will surely earn you their favour.

'You wish to earn the trust of the village? Very well. As a people, we live off the land. Hunters who enter the dangerous wilds to feed the village are highly esteemed here. If you enter the forest and hunt deer for us, you may win the favour of the people.'
